# mode1 generate code table 

for example 
```python
python3 linear_code.py -m1  -r 0.4  -n 6 -p 0.2
```

![](./imgs/11.png)


# mode2 to encode msg

```python
python3 linear_code.py -m2 -y info.json -m helloworldthisisatestmsg 
```
![](./imgs/22.png)

# mode3 decode msg 
```python
python3 linear_code.py -m3 -f info.json -y 
```
![](./imgs/33.png)
